segments.text: Good , morning ! Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . Could you tell me the times of trains to London , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . There are trains at 7 fifty-nine , 9 eighteen , 10 thirty-two and 11 fifty-five .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time does the 7 fifty-nine get to London ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At 9 thirty-six . And the 9 eighteen gets to London at 9 fifty-five , the 10 thirty-two at 11 nine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about coming back ? I'd like to come back about 7 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's one at 19 and the next is at 19 forty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you get on before 4 p . m . or after 6 p . m . there is saver return which is $ 9.45 , an ordinary return is $ 16.45 .
segments.speaker: S1
